moves.2. d4 d5 3. e5 c5 4. c3 Nc6 5. Nf3 b6: This shocked me, I have never run into anybody else who plays that, is it a line of the French that I'm not familiar with?
moves.6. Bd3: I played what I thought was best.
moves.6... cxd4 7. cxd4 h6 8. O-O Nge7 9. Be3: Be3?? Why did I play that, I'll let you answer that.
moves.9... Nf5 10. Bb5 Bd7 11. Nc3 Bb4 12. Rc1: To me it looked like Rc1 was forced.
moves.12... a6: I knew he was going to play that.
moves.17... O-O 18. Ng3 Nxe3: A mistake on blacks part, he took my bad bishop for his good knight.
moves.21... Qxc8 22. Qe1: Trying to maybe get my Queen to g3.
moves.22... Qc2 23. Qe3: It's just a pawn why guard it?
moves.23... Rc8 24. Qf4: My threat is Ne1, sort of.
moves.26... bxa4 27. bxa4 Qc6: I don't think he can take that pawn, I think Nf6+ wins, but I did not see that so...
moves.32... Bxa4: I think that was a mistake.
moves.41. Rxh6 Qf1+ 42. Kh2: He has a draw here if he wants it, I should 42.Kg3!
